Fill two glasses with regular tap water. One glass will be your control glass.
Place one of the glasses close to "Sapphire Waves" app for 10 minutes.
Take a sip from the energized glass and then from the other glass.
Place a glass of water in front of your monitor.

Restores Water

Sapphire Waves is a simple, innovative app for restoring water to its purest form. It revitalizes and recharges water with the vital energies and healing properties that encourage growth and development.

Simple and Safe

Simply place a glass of water or milk formula with water inside close to the Sapphire Waves app displayed on your computer screen or smartphone, after 10 minutes you will have a revitalized water.

100% External

No chemicals, additives or supplements are added to the water. By channeling electromagnetic energy of the universe Sapphire Waves app helps you feel better and easier to go through daily challenges.

Years of Research

Sapphire Waves app is a result of long research and exhaustive testing that is perfectly safe for mother and baby.
without changing the chemical composition of the water you can rearrange the molecular arrangement

In past decade phenomenal amount of researchers started researching water and water potential. It started because usable water is receding per person. While researching, they found out that without changing the chemical composition of the water you can rearrange the molecular arrangement in such a way that the water will behave completely in a different way.
The app that restores water's memory to its natural state.

Sapphire Waves is a revolutionary app that revitalizes the water we drink. It restores the water to its purest state by re-activating its memory therefore increasing and energizing any healing properties.

After adding water to your baby’s bottle, place the bottle near the Sapphire Waves app for 10 minutes. The transference of the electromagnetic field properties, enhanced by the Sapphire Waves app, will ease the baby’s digestion and flatulence.

Our brain is surrounded by fluid responsible for the blood flow to the brain. Sapphire Waves app restores the electromagnetic field of the brain to its full effect preventing sleep deprivation, fragmented sleep or bad dreams.
